about_the_game:
A set of items that will come in handy from the beginning to the middle of the story.

Mark of the Sword+ x2
Mark of the Axe+ x2
Mark of the Shield+ x2
Mark of Armor+ x2
Mark of the Grail+ x2
Mark of the Lyre+ x2
Faint Hope+ x2

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
